title: Coronation Street spoilers: Character to be exposed as secret bigamist
text:
There’s drama ahead on the Cobbles (Picture: ITV)

Coronation Street’s Sally (Sally Dynevor) and Tim Metcalfe (Joe Duttine) are set for heartache this Christmas as an excruciating bigamist storyline is on the horizon for the couple.

It all kicks off when Kevin Webster (Michael Le Vell) discovers that Tim tied the knot to a mystery woman in Las Vegas and failed to properly annul the marriage.

The drama continues when Sally finds out about Tim’s secret – and unsurprisingly the pair come to a crossroads.

‘Sally and Tim’s marriage is seen as one of the most stable on the cobbles, so this will come as a real shock,’ an insider teased.

‘As Tim starts to panic, he will try to fix things by arranging a divorce from his Vegas wife, while planning to renew his wedding vows to Sally.’

Sally and Tim Metcalfe are going to be put through their paces (Picture: ITV)

The source continued to The Sun: ‘He hopes that if their second vows are binding and he is divorced , they will be legally married after all.

‘Viewers will have to wait and see if the elaborate plan pays off.’

Last month it was revealed that Emmerdale star Sian Reeves would be joining Coronation Street as a face of Tim’s past.

The cast were spotted filming the scenes on location and Sian was all smiles as she was pictured in her new role.

Audiences know Sally and Tim have had rather a rocky time of late, what with Sally’s wrongful arrest and jail stint for fraud and Tim thinking he’d bedded Sally’s sister Gina Seddon when he was drunk.

They’ve managed to pull through before, but will Tim’s bigamy be the final straw?
